ComicInfo.Summary: Chas names the great garbage patch the "New Texas Settlement" and begins exploring. The government begins to investigate Worthington energy. Chas discovers "natives" on the garbage patch and then it is attacked by "Yalafath" a giant squid.
ComicInfo.Title: Man Vs. Nature Vs. Man
